body:
Features and Enhancements

Group Name/Affiliation
  • Group Name in Provider Profile views
    • Group Name has been added to Provider Profile in Network360 and will display if included in project data.
    • Group Name has been added to the split-screen view in Competitive Access Gap Map and will display if included in project data.
  • Group Name in Provider List Export
    • A Group Name column has been added to the network360_provider_export. The column will appear regardless of whether group data is present in the project.
  • Note: Group Name data must be included in the data processed by Strenuus.
  • Note: The terms Group Name, Group Affiliation and Group Practice are used interchangeably.
  • For more information, email Network360 Support.
